link.title: Cyber School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

div.p: Governor Wolf has closed all public schools through the end of the 2019-2020 academic year, which in Clairton is June 5th. While our building may be closed, the teachers and staff are working from home virtually delivering a continuity of educational services. Our goal is for all students to maintain and develop the knowledge and skills required for the next grade level and graduation.
For online learning instructions, please visit ccsdbears.org/learnonline
For the latest COVID-19 updates and information, please visit ccsdbears.org/covid19

div.a: Updated Notice from Dr. Hunt Regarding COVID-19 -- April 9, 2020
div.span:
Dear Parent/Guardian,
As we end this fourth week of school closure, I wish to share with you how much we miss our students and care about you, our families. We hope you are all in good health physically and emotionally. Please click to read more.

Clairton City School District is seeking donations to help purchase 350 Chromebooks to provide online learning for all of our students and to ensure the health and well-being of children and families who rely on technology to access health care when required to shelter in place. Please click to read more.
Kennywood school picnic ticket sales will be online-only this year. Click here for more information.

a.span: Clairton City School District logo link to home page

div.p: The Clairton City School District is an equal opportunity education institution and will not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, handicap, or limited English proficiency in its activities, programs, or employment practices as required by the PA Human Relations Act, Title IX, and Section 504. For information regarding civil rights or grievance procedures, contact Dr. Ginny L. Hunt, Title IX Coordinator and Section 504 Coordinator at the Administration Building, 502 Mitchell Avenue, Clairton, PA 15025 or 412-233-7090 Ext. 2200. The Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission website is www.phrc.pa.gov.
